_description: An English tag in a Latin sermon, two lines

OxfMagd27.Transcription: Holy Bede breket bondþat ne mai þe rith hond
OxfMagd27.Editions:
Coxe,  Henry Octavius. 
             Catalogus codicum mss. qui in collegiis aulisque
                oxoniensibus….
         Oxon: e Typographeo academico, 1852: 18.
